A Little About Me

I'm from Nogales, Sonora, Currently going to university in Hermosillo. I'm on my 5th year of uni, I'm interested in front-end and some game development and starting to learn web technologies. At the moment I know some JS , React, Vue, Phaser, Godot and Bootstrap. I speak english, spanish and some french.

Some of technologies I've used:
